backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor with catalog data, authorization mixin, order types, and a query to return a hardcoded catalog.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that initializes an empty orders map when upgrading from an old actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence scores.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for build and documentation tooling.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the application with React Query and cart providers and renders MainApp.
frontend/src/components/BrandedHeader.ts: Displays the branded header with logo, navigation buttons, cart badge, and login button.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Renders responsive category tabs using shadcn/ui Tabs, forwarding selection changes to the parent.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
Authentication gate that blocks children until Internet Identity login is complete or prompts user to sign in.
frontend/src/features/cart/CartContext.t: Provides cart state, persistence, and functions for adding, removing, and updating items.
frontend/src/features/cart/cartMath.ts: Utility functions for computing line totals, cart totals, and formatting those totals.
frontend/src/features/cart/CartPage.tsx: Renders the cart UI with item lists, quantity controls, totals, and navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/features/cart/storage.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing cart data in localStorage with bigint serialization.
frontend/src/features/cart/types.ts: Defines cart item and cart state types and provides a helper for generating item keys.
frontend/src/features/cart/useCart.ts: Hook for accessing the cart context, throwing an error if used outside the provider.
frontend/src/features/catalog/CatalogPag: Displays catalog categories, search, item lists, and integrates cart actions and loading/error states.
frontend/src/features/catalog/formatting: Formats bigint prices into fixed AED currency strings.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: Fetches catalog data via react-query using the backend actor with retry and freshness settings.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutP: Checkout form with validation, order submission, authentication gating, and cart clearing on success.
frontend/src/features/checkout/checkoutT: Defines checkout form data shape and initial form values.
frontend/src/features/orders/MyOrdersPag: Displays the authenticated user's orders with loading, error, empty, and list states, and supports navigation to order details.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderConfir: Shows a confirmation screen after an order is placed and provides navigation to My Orders or the catalog.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderDetail: Displays detailed information for a selected order, including items, address, and totals, with fallback if not found.
frontend/src/features/orders/useMyOrders: Fetches the current user's orders using react-query, enabled when an authenticated actor is available.
frontend/src/features/orders/usePlaceOrd: Creates and submits an order from cart data and invalidates the orders query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/MainApp.tsx: Implements simple view-based navigation between catalog, cart, checkout, confirmation, and order pages via local state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash), storing them in session storage, and clearing them, with URL values taking precedence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, including features, requirements, and pending requests for a mobile-first laundry ordering application.
